# AllocationInputDto

The exact allocation of guests to rooms.

**Properties**

| Name           | Type       | Required | Description                         |
| :------------- | :--------- | :------- | :---------------------------------- |
| NumberOfAdults | long       | ✅       | The number of adults for this room. |
| Children       | List<long> | ❌       | The children ages for this room.    |
